gw.plugin.clone

Interface PolicyPeriodQuoteClonePlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface PolicyPeriodQuoteClonePlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToPurgeClonedPeriodsQuery(Query query)
      Add restrictions to the query in purging cloned policy periods
      void cleanupAfterCloningPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod clonedPeriod)
      Used to clean the cloned Policy Period before it is locked.
      void processClonedPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod clonedPeriod)
      This is called after the policy period has been cloned and the status is set to UNPROCESSED When done processing the policy period, this method should set the status to PURGEABLE, so the cloned Period may be purged.
      boolean shouldCloneQuote(PolicyPeriod period) 

    • Method Detail

      • shouldCloneQuote

        boolean shouldCloneQuote(PolicyPeriod period)
        Parameters:
        period - the PolicyPeriod containing the quote
        Returns:
        true if this policy period should be cloned else false

      • cleanupAfterCloningPolicyPeriod

        void cleanupAfterCloningPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod clonedPeriod)
        Used to clean the cloned Policy Period before it is locked. Ex. If costs have a FK to PolicyFXRate then new PolicyFXRates need to be created for the cloned Policy Periods costs

        IMPORTANT NOTE: Implementors *only* need to deep clone non-EffDated entities in this method. All EffDated entities will be automatically deep-cloned. The only objects that need to be deep-cloned in this method are non-EffDateds (e.g., Retireables) that have foreign keys to PolicyPeriod.

        Parameters:
        clonedPeriod - the temporary PolicyPeriod containing the quote

      • processClonedPolicyPeriod

        void processClonedPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod clonedPeriod)
        This is called after the policy period has been cloned and the status is set to UNPROCESSED When done processing the policy period, this method should set the status to PURGEABLE, so the cloned Period may be purged.
        Parameters:
        clonedPeriod - the PolicyPeriod containing the quote

      • addToPurgeClonedPeriodsQuery

        void addToPurgeClonedPeriodsQuery(Query query)
        Add restrictions to the query in purging cloned policy periods
        Parameters:
        query - Will contain the query for temporary cloned periods that are marked for purge
